reviews.productTitle: Hussell Hair Treatment Serum Bali Secret - 40 Hair Care Capsules - No Rinse - With Argan Macadamia & Avocado Oils - Vitamins A, E, & Pro B5 - Conditioner for Women & Men
reviews.text: The only hair oil you need, you can use it as a treatment or before you blow dry your hair, for blow drying a lil goes a long way . Smells amazing, gives shine and keeps it light, i have frizzy hair so it work very well to tame my hair .

reviews.title: Very good product!

reviews.productTitle: Hussell Hair Treatment Serum Bali Secret - 40 Hair Care Capsules - No Rinse - With Argan Macadamia & Avocado Oils - Vitamins A, E, & Pro B5 - Conditioner for Women & Men
reviews.text: Really great oil but I will not be purchasing again. It is incredibly difficult to open! If you are someone with hand mobility issues I would not recommend. You can use scissors to cut open but it’s a hassle. The capsule needs to be easier to open.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2025
reviews.title: Hard to open

reviews.productTitle: Hussell Hair Treatment Serum Bali Secret - 40 Hair Care Capsules - No Rinse - With Argan Macadamia & Avocado Oils - Vitamins A, E, & Pro B5 - Conditioner for Women & Men
reviews.text: It leaves my hair very hydrated and soft. Constant use has made my hair feel healthy and in good condition, despite the dye. Last time, I made a mistake and ordered another brand thinking it was the same. Phew! I made a huge mistake and had to reorder it less than 10 days later; the difference was very obvious. There are imitations out there, and they're not the best. I recommend it and will definitely order it again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2025
reviews.title: I would order it again and again, very good

reviews.productTitle: Hussell Hair Treatment Serum Bali Secret - 40 Hair Care Capsules - No Rinse - With Argan Macadamia & Avocado Oils - Vitamins A, E, & Pro B5 - Conditioner for Women & Men
reviews.text: This is the CRAZIEST hair product I have ever purchased! I am literally always disappointed with hair products, always to heavy or make my hair feel built up and disgusting. THIS ON THE OTHER HAND BLEW ME AWAY! I have never in my life been so blown away by a hair product this made my long thick hair silk soft and it smells very clean. I barely touched my hair with it because I was scared at first and didn’t know if the little bead was to much and my fingers glided through hair that wasn’t even brushed and the shine is unreal I seriously will never ever live without this product again. I seriously am so blown out of the water!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2025
reviews.title: Craziest hair product I have ever used!
